36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"For whomever Allah protects against the evil of what is between his jaws and the evil of what is between his legs, he shall enter Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حِفْظِ اللِّسَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Protecting The Tongue
